content: > if you purchase 4 of my designs at the same time they need to be in the same cart you will get the least expensive for free thank you so much for supporting my designs this shawl is knitted from the left corner to the right edge the pattern is fully written row-by-row **yarn** kid-silk drops 75% mohair and 25% silk 0 88 oz/25 g = 230 yds /210 m col 13 1 skein usage 0 4 oz/11 g kid royal alize 62% kid mohair 38% polyamide 0 88 oz/25 g = 273 yds/250 m kol 856 1 skein usage 0 88 oz/25 g *you can make this shawl with yarn of any thickness weight and composition match the size of the needles to it * **tools** us 3 / 3 25 mm circular needles tapestry needle for weaving **gauge** garter stitch after wet blocking 4 x 4 / 10 x 10 cm = 18 sts and 40 row translation of the pattern into danish by marianne holmen 1 1 https //strikkeglad dk/42477/croissant/
